text: Ranvijay Singh Judev is a Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) politician. He was a Member of Parliament, representing Chhattisgarh in the Rajya Sabha the upper house of Indian Parliament. He lives in Jashpur, Chhattisgarh. He is nephew of former union minister Dilip Singh Judeo. == References == ==External links== *Ranvijay Singh Judev - Rajya Sabha Profile Category:1969 births Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Chhattisgarh Category:Living people Category:People from Jashpur district Category:Rajya Sabha members from Chhattisgarh
title: Ranvijay Singh Judev
